title: Silver player needs tips
body:
Hey guys,

I’ve been playing for roughly 2-3 months now but extremely actively, i was placed at B1 after placements, deranked to B5 because of inexperience from rushing level 30.
After about a month grind I am now S5. And have held a pretty solid 60% win rate after watching tonnes of videos and gameplays.

The problem is is I have plateued, and like every player, I don’t want to say it, but I’m stuck.

But I don’t find it any different, I still average over 60% win rate if I get my role I’ve sole myself too, yet if I get filled I lose almost 100% of the time, I main 1 champ but can play 3 efficiently.

My problem is, is do I learn a laning role (I main jungle) or do I keep focusing on my game as is and rely on getting my role. Whenever I get filled I get roasted saying don’t play ranked if you can’t play all the roles, is this true or should I stick to my game.
I can play mid pretty well as I’m pretty mechanically good from previous gaming experience, just not good enough to risk it in ranked, so I set support as my secondary role as I’m not relied on a heavy and as long as I keep the ADC healthy it seems very easy.

Higher level players please feel free to add and chat, I could really use a mentor.

-Jebby
-Silver 5
